author: Jeff Peacock
comment: GORGEOUS app! After a bit of a wait (it really does take a while for the app to load and sync to your watch, but it's WORTH IT), I couldn't be more happy with the look and ability to customize the already beautiful watch faces - great job. GET THIS APP!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for such a great review Jeff.  It encourages us to make more free content.  Have a fantastic weekend.

author: Andrew Evans
comment: There are a good selection of free watch faces to choose from and some of the premium faces look very neat, just need to decide which to choose. The only bugbear is that the date formats do not change from mm/dd to dd/mm even when I  have changed it in settings which is a bit frustrating.

title: Quality Faces

author: Roger Roger
comment: I find the are a number of selection, but once selecting a face, then using the settings, trying to save is an issue. Color chart is cool, but if the face could be seen while doing it, it would be better

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for the info Roger.  We will look further into this.

title: So so...

author: Chad Payne
comment: If you have a gear live and you are having issues switching faces, you need to get your software updated to 5.1.1. I was having an issue where it would not allow me to change my face beyond the default face. I finally found out that there are many faces that are not compatible with older android versions! I had to use recovery from XDA development and push the latest firmware because for some reason the watch wouldn't update past 5.0.1. So many issues repaired!
title: Gear Live Issues SOLVED

author: Eric Kaiser
comment: But it's hammering my battery, using more than the screen!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi Eric.  It's no different than any other LCD screen.  Darker the background colour, longer the battery lasts.  It's all in your hands.  Now that you understand we ask that you reconsider your review.

title: Some nice free faces

author: Phil M
comment: Great selection of faces, probably the best of the many sets I've tried. Easy to set and install each face. Works very well on the Huawei watch and they do look impressive.
